Articles.Content:
I disagree vehemently, good sir.

Yellow plus white does not equal green, but merely a lighter yellow.

Whatver. I lol'd. (Those Quebec bunnies are very, very strange, btw. Actually, Quebec culture is odd in general, from the rest of Canada's PoV. That said, best goddamn jazz scene in the country...okay tangent over.)

Pretty nice theory ^^ But I wonder how Squad really came to the idea of Kerbal. Hope we will know, someday.

@Phoenix actually, this rabbits are french. They were designed in Ubisoft Montpelier, for "Rayman Raving Rabbids" (or "Rayman contre les lapins crÃƒÂ©tins" in french) .

Edited September 27, 2012 by Xeo
